00002 #include "ns3/log.h"

00006 #include "ns3/queue.h"
00007 #include "ns3/node.h"
00008 #include "CsmaNode.h"
00009 #include "CsmaChannelNode.h"
00010 NS_OBJECT_ENSURE_REGISTERED(CsmaChannelNode);
00011 
00012 ns3::TypeId CsmaChannelNode::GetTypeId(void) {
00013         static ns3::TypeId type_id =
00014                         ns3::TypeId("CsmaChannelNode").SetParent<Base> ().AddConstructor<
00015                                         CsmaChannelNode> ();
00016         return type_id;
00017 }//GetTypeId
00018 
00019 CsmaChannelNode::CsmaChannelNode(const int n_devices,
00020                 ns3::DataRateValue data_rate, ns3::TimeValue delay) :
00021         CsmaNode(n_devices) {
00022         NS_LOG_INFO("constructing CsmaChannelNode with " << n_devices << " devices");
00023         this->csmaChannelFactory.SetTypeId("ns3::CsmaChannel");
00024         this->csmaChannelFactory.Set("DataRate", data_rate);
00025         this->csmaChannelFactory.Set("Delay", delay);
00026         for (unsigned i = 0; i < this->GetNDevices(); ++i) {
00027                 ns3::Ptr<ns3::CsmaChannel>
00028                                 ptr_csma_channel =
00029                                                 this->csmaChannelFactory.Create()->GetObject<
00030                                                                 ns3::CsmaChannel> ();
00031                 NS_LOG_INFO("attaching a channel to device #" << i);
00032                 this->getCsmaNetDevice(i)->Attach(ptr_csma_channel);
00033         }//for
00034 }
00035 
00036 ns3::Ptr<ns3::CsmaChannel> CsmaChannelNode::getCsmaChannel(unsigned i_channel) {
00037         NS_ASSERT(i_channel < this->GetNDevices());
00038         auto ptr_csma_net_device = this->getCsmaNetDevice(i_channel);
00039         auto ptr_channel = ptr_csma_net_device->GetChannel();
00040         auto ptr_csma_channel = ptr_channel->GetObject<ns3::CsmaChannel> ();
00041         return ptr_csma_channel;
00042 }

00048 void CsmaChannelNode::bring(ns3::Ptr<CsmaNode> ptr_newcomer,
00049                 const unsigned i_their_csma_device) {
00050         this->bring(0, ptr_newcomer, i_their_csma_device);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void CsmaChannelNode::bring(const unsigned i_our_csma_device,
00054                 ns3::Ptr<CsmaNode> ptr_their_node, const unsigned i_their_csma_device) {
00055         auto ptr_our_csma_channel = this->getCsmaChannel(i_our_csma_device);
00056         auto their_csma_device = ptr_their_node->getCsmaNetDevice(
00057                         i_their_csma_device);
00058         //auto ptr_newcomer_device = ptr_newcomer->getCsmaNetDevice();
00059         their_csma_device->Attach(ptr_our_csma_channel);
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CsmaChannelNode::setDataRate(ns3::DataRateValue& data_rate,
00063                 const unsigned i_channel) {
00064         auto ptr_csma_net_device = this->getCsmaNetDevice(i_channel);
00065         ptr_csma_net_device->SetAttribute("DataRate", data_rate);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CsmaChannelNode::setDelay(ns3::TimeValue& delay, const unsigned i_channel) {
00069         auto p = this->getCsmaNetDevice(i_channel);
00070         p->SetAttribute("Delay", delay);
00071 }
